Title: Relates to prohibiting the sale of high purity sodium nitrite
Summary: Prohibits the sale of high purity sodium nitrite to persons under the age of 21 and without proof of the intended use for institutional or scientific purposes.
LawCode: Add ยง392-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of high purity sodium nitrite
